Job Title: Global Pricing Manager

Location: Center Valley, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Overview

Shift4 (NYSE: FOUR) is boldly redefining commerce by simplifying complex payments ecosystems across the world. As the leader in commerce-enabling technology, Shift4 powers billions of transactions annually for hundreds of thousands of businesses in virtually every industry. For more information, visit www.shift4.com.

As the leader in commerce-enabling technology, Shift4 powers billions of transactions annually for hundreds of thousands of businesses in virtually every industry. For more information, visit www.shift4.com.

Responsibilities

Overall responsibility for identifying and leading pricing improvement activities including hands-on data analysis, price strategy, margin improvement, price effectiveness and capability needs of the organization.Understand Global Payments system and reporting tools to support pricing and billing reconciliationsPerform & maintain interchange & card brand mappingWork on Global Parter Payout and upfront bonus. Work with IT to automate process and validate system logicResponsible and Owner of whole Global Cananda platform from Pricing Billing and PayoutSupport merchant pricing & billingSetup & maintain merchant profile for pricingSetup & maintain mapping for statement and residualsSupport tax reportingVerify Global Payments invoice on a monthly basisCreate month end reporting for volume and revenue

Qualifications

A minimum of 5+ years of relevant work experience in pricing, with hands-on data visualization expertise. A proven track record of implementing and successfully executing pricing strategies to achieve margin expansion. Use data visualizations to facilitate storytelling, and data exploration. Must be an effective change agent; balances consistency with flexibility and willing to change ideas in the face of new information. Preferable knowledge on Global PlatformExcellent communication skills -able to convey complex concepts to technical and business teams in a simple and understandable way.
